description:

It's not easy to explain exactly the situation because I am a novice in openstack.

comments.content:
ConnectFailure: Unable to establish connection to http://10.0.0.11:9696/v2.0/networks.json

 this indicated you have some trouble in let nova communcate with neutron, please 
refer to openstack install and configure doc http://docs.openstack.org
for additional info, especially make sure compute service (nova) is well configured
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~jichenjc
